thread.title: Studio’s New Movie Distribution Strategy Set for First Test
thread.title_full: Studio’s New Movie Distribution Strategy Set for First Test - WSJ

author: Erich Schwartzel
title: Studio’s New Movie Distribution Strategy Set for First Test
text:
The opening next Friday of “Paranormal Activity: The Ghost Dimension” has more than just moviegoers spooked.
The latest installment of the horror series, along with the Oct. 30 release of “Scouts Guide to the Zombie Apocalypse,” is part of an unprecedented distribution experiment by Viacom Inc.’s Paramount Pictures. If it works, it could rewrite how Hollywood studios release movies and when viewers are able to watch them at home. But... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
